title: Asking about payment plans
context: Ask if the store offers financing or a payment plan for a large purchase.

content.bestLine: Do you offer financing or a payment plan for this purchase?

neutral.text: What payment options do you have?
Do you have a financing program?
Is there a payment plan available?
How can I pay for this over time?
What are my payment options for this purchase?
Do you offer any payment assistance?

informal.text: Can I pay for this in chunks?
Do you have a layaway plan?
Can I get financing for this?
How can I break up the cost?
Is there a way to pay over time?
Can I make payments on this?
Do you have any payment deals?

formal.text: I would like to inquire about your payment plan options.
Could you please inform me about your financing options?
I am interested in learning about your payment terms.
Do you offer any financing programs for large purchases?
I would appreciate information about your payment plans.
Could you please explain your payment options to me?

patterns.template: Do you offer [options] for large purchases?
Can I pay for this in [options]?

lines.text: Yes, we offer a financing program with monthly payments.
